hashiras.title: Kyojuro Rengoku
hashiras.description: Kyojuro Rengoku is a Demon Slayer and the Flame Hashira of the Demon Slayer Corps. He is a very passionate and determined person.

hashiras.title: Shinobu Kocho
hashiras.description: Shinobu Kocho is a Demon Slayer and the Insect Hashira of the Demon Slayer Corps. She is a very kind and gentle person.

hashiras.title: Mitsuri Kanroji
hashiras.description: Mitsuri Kanroji is a Demon Slayer and the Love Hashira of the Demon Slayer Corps. She is a very passionate and loving person.

hashiras.title: Muichiro Tokito
hashiras.description: Muichiro Tokito is a Demon Slayer and the Mist Hashira of the Demon Slayer Corps. He is a very quiet and reserved person.

hashiras.title: Gyomei Himejima
hashiras.description: Gyomei Himejima is a Demon Slayer and the Stone Hashira of the Demon Slayer Corps. He is a very strong and determined person.

hashiras.title: Sanemi Shinazugawa
hashiras.description: Sanemi Shinazugawa is a Demon Slayer and the Wind Hashira of the Demon Slayer Corps. He is a very serious and determined person.

hashiras.title: Tengen Uzui
hashiras.description: Tengen Uzui is a Demon Slayer and the Sound Hashira of the Demon Slayer Corps. He is a very flamboyant and confident person.

hashiras.title: Obanai Iguro
hashiras.description: Obanai Iguro is a Demon Slayer and the Serpent Hashira of the Demon Slayer Corps. He is a very serious and determined person.
